medical_history.chief_complaint: Mid abdominal pain for the last 24 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Onset of abdominal pain began yesterday morning. Pain severity is rated 8 out of 10, sharp in quality, radiating to pelvis. Pain worsens with movement. No nausea or vomiting. Last bowel movement was 2 days ago, with reduced flatus.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Paroxysmal A. fib on Eliquis, hypertension, cervical radiculitis, migraines, gastroesophageal reflux, chronic pain, intermittent chronic cough, depression, macrocytic anemia of unclear etiology.
medical_history.family_history: No known family history of CAD or arrhythmia.
